snippet: Arsonists have burned down seven schools in northeastern Nigeria over the past few days, the authorities said Thursday, blaming the violent Islamist sect Boko Haram.
abstract: Arsonists burn down seven schools in northeastern Nigeria; authorities are blaming the violent Islamist sect Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: Arsonists have burned down seven schools in northeastern Nigeria over the past few days, the authorities said Thursday, blaming the violent Islamist sect Boko Haram.
